= Debug =

== Valgrind ==
Compile with debug info:
{{{
gcc -o test -g test.c
}}}

Then:
{{{
valgrind --tool=memcheck --leak-check=yes --show-reachable=yes --num-callers=20 --track-fds=yes ./test
}}}

References:
  * [http://cs.ecs.baylor.edu/~donahoo/tools/valgrind/ Basic Valgrind Tutorial]
